items.sentence: Who looks after you when you're not feeling well?
Tell Tom how to get to the post office from here.
Many mathematicians are bad at mental arithmetic.
Tom seemed to be satisfied with what we gave him.
We're planning to try doing that again on Monday.
Tom ended up calling Mary and asking her to help.
Tom is expecting you to say that you'll help him.
Tom is too in love with Mary to notice her flaws.
How long did it take you to house break your dog?
We don't want people to find out what we've done.
Tom allowed his daughter Mary to go to the party.
I think both Tom and Mary are going to get fired.
Do you think both Tom and Mary have already left?
You aren't permitted to do that without a permit.
I shouldn't have said those things I said to you.
That's the last piece of advice that Tom gave me.
Our ancestors came to this country 150 years ago.
Your watch is similar to mine in shape and color.
The museum had to close because of lack of money.
I can't for the life of me remember where it was.
